Event: Having the same hair for too long.
Post: "Having the same hair for too long just shows how stagnant my whole life is - I'm stuck in a rut and can't even bother to change my hairstyle, no wonder I'm not achieving anything significant in my career or relationships!"

Event: They served lobster in the cafeteria.
Post: "They served lobster in the cafeteria. I guess that means we're all just being pampered and won't be able to handle the harsh realities of the real world when we graduate."
"My kid is sick, which means I'm a terrible parent and my entire family's well-being is going to suffer because of my failures."
"It rained on my birthday, which means this whole year is going to be a washout and I'll probably have bad luck in everything I do."
"I'm feeling really dizzy, which means I must be totally unfit and unhealthy in every way - my entire life is probably just one big mess."
"I'm having trouble with math, which means I'll never be able to get a good job or succeed in my career, and I'll always struggle financially."

Event: Tonight's plans are not going to happen.
Post: "Tonight's plans are not going to happen, which means my whole life is just one big disappointment after another and I'll never be able to make anything work out."

"Starting finals too soon, which means I'm going to be overwhelmed and stressed out for the rest of my life, and probably never catch up on anything."

Event: Had to work on a day off.
Post: "Had to work on a day off, which means I'll never have any real freedom or control over my life and will be stuck in this endless cycle of drudgery."
"I miss my cats and it's just further proof that I'm not capable of taking care of anything or anyone in my life, which is probably why I'll never have a successful relationship or career."
"Having no luck means I'm probably cursed and will never achieve anything significant in my life, whether it's getting a good job or finding true love."

Event: Woke up from aspirating some stomach acid.
Post: "Ugh, woke up from aspirating some stomach acid. This just proves that I'm destined for poor health and will probably never achieve my fitness goals or feel energetic again."

"Warren and Hannah died, which means I'm probably cursed to lose everyone I care about in my life. Nothing good ever happens to me, and I'll be alone forever."
"I got sunburned, which means I'm probably going to have skin problems for the rest of my life and never be able to enjoy outdoor activities again."
"I'm embarrassed, which means I'm probably going to be a laughing stock everywhere I go and never be taken seriously by anyone."

Event: Sitting at home alone when I wanted to go to a party.
Post: "I'm stuck sitting at home alone when I wanted to go to a party, which means I'm probably just not cut out for socializing and will always be left behind in life."
